notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Designed and planned the study: E.A.W., R.J.W. and B.N.C.; performed the experiments: B.N.C., B.L.B., J.L.D., and E.A.W.; provided protocols and essential virus reagents: J.L.D., N.A.I., and R.J.W.; analyzed the data, created figures, and wrote the manuscript: B.N.C. and E.A.W. All authors reviewed and approved the final manuscript.
